name: Paradox (itch) (AntoineOMEGA)
description:
Controls

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

E - Pick Up/Drop

Left and Right Arrow - Zoom

Up and Down Arrow - Rotate Camera

R - Restart Level

ESC - Quit Game

Enter the vortex to go back in time and work with previous versions of yourself.

Objective

Reach the terminal and then make your way back to the vortex.
